name: Homeless Children's Network
description: The mission of Homeless Children’s Network is to decrease the trauma of homelessness and domestic violence for children, youth, and families; to empower families; and to increase the effectiveness of collaborative efforts among service providers to end homelessness and poverty. Homeless Children's Network provides family-focused and child-centered therapy to homeless and formerly homeless children and youth (ages 0-25) and their families through individual counseling, play therapy, family counse
